radiographic_examinations.findings: Increasing atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally and new small bilateral pleural effusions. Several loculated fluid collections new compared to prior study; the largest measures 2.6 x 2.7 by 6.2 cm in the right lower quadrant. Filling defect in a mesenteric venous branch unchanged.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: New loculated fluid collections compared to prior study.
